short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover new movies and tv shows with every tab. Every new tab you open will present wallpapers from a random movie or tv show.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover new movies and tv shows, and revisit old ones with every tab. Every tab you open will show wallpapers of a random movie. Watch trailers, get IMDb rating and buy from Amazon.

Features: 
 * Quickly explore more details by visiting the IMDb/TMDb page for the movie/show.
 * Rating from IMDb  
 * Watch trailers from the movie 
 * Watch movies on Amazon Instant Video
 * Filter what you want to see (Top Rated, Popular, Now Playing or Upcoming) 
 * Safe for work
